attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election due to the slease and fraud by many MPs resulting in loss of public confidence in UK politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the past few weeks, we have seen our MPs going against moral obligations in their claims for expenses, and also in the recent past many government members attempting to make secret the claims of expenses from its electorates.
We need to clean up british politics now and vote in people we trust. We sign this petition to declare that we do not trust this government or members of the House of Commons, therfore would like to call an immediate General Election.

rejection.details: There is an existing petition on the Number 10 site calling for a general election which has already attracted a lot of support. You may wish to sign it instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
